long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage your tasks effortlessly right within your browser using the Simply Todo extension. Say goodbye to toggling between apps or overlooking crucial tasks. Delve into a seamless experience offering:

📝 Quick Entry – Jump in and jot down tasks in an instant. As soon as you open the extension, the input box is ready for your next todo.
⌨️ Keyboard Shortcut – Access your tasks even faster with a keyboard shortcut. Use Ctrl+Shift+S (or Command+Shift+S on Mac) to pop open Simply Todo.
🔢 Task Counter – Always know how many tasks are pending with the at-a-glance indicator on the extension icon. Stay informed and plan accordingly.
🔄 Intuitive Drag-and-Drop – Adjust priorities and shuffle todos with a smooth drag-and-drop mechanism.
✅ One-Click Completion – Wrap up tasks with a mere click.
💾 Consistency Across Devices – Your tasks are diligently saved and synchronized, ready for you whenever you fire up Chrome.
🎨 Refined Design – A more compact and minimalistic design ensures zero distractions.
🔒 Your Privacy, Our Priority – Your todos are yours alone. We stand by your privacy and never access your tasks.
